trans-unit.source: Configuration
Please go to the Extension Manager Settings and hit the "Update" button of the configuration of html2pdf.
PHP: proc_open()
proc_open() is need to call the wkhtmltopdf binary. If it is disabled please ask your Administrator or Hoster for help.
Binaries
The path to the binary is not configured. Please head over to the Extension Manager Settings and configure the path in the configuration of html2pdf.
PDF Generation
PDF generated successfully.
PDF Generation
PDF generation failed. Error Code:
Operating System
html2pdf does not have Windows binaries bundled. You can download them. Make sure your server has the necessary binary installed and set it in the Extension Configuration.
html2pdf does not have MAC OS X binaries bundled. You can download them. Make sure your server has the necessary binary installed and set it in the Extension Configuration.
Support for your operating system is unknown. Check the download page of wkhtmltopdf for binaries for your Operating System.
Hook: contentPostProc-output
used by
Make sure the classes calling the hook don't influence each other negatively:
html2pdf is the only extension using this hook.
Hook: pageIndexing
used by
Make sure the classes calling the hook don't influence each other negatively:
html2pdf is the only extension using this hook.
PDF generation was disabled for this page.
Converter could not be initialized.
The value "%s" must be a string or array.
The value "%s" was not set. Did you update the Extensions settings of "%s"?
No binary for wkhtmltopdf was specified.
A shell error occured while trying to run wkhtmltopdf:
wkhtmltopdf threw an error when trying to create a PDF. Developers see the developer log for more information.
wkhtmltopdf did not return anything when trying to create a PDF. Developers see the developer log for more information.
